definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Is 5:27 waistcloth (NH id., Ar. 0’iza0run, cf. RS:JQ Jan. 1892, 289 ff.)—´[[א]] abs. Job 12:18 + 8 t; cstr. 2Ki 1:8 + 4 t.;—of skin 2Ki 1:8 (prophet.); of linen Je 13:1 (v. Che) cf. v:Je 13:2, v:Je 13:4, v:Je 13:6, v:Je 13:7, v:Je 13:7, v:Je 13:10, v:Je 13:11 (symbol. of Isr. & Jud. cleaving to ´[[י]]); of Assyrian war-riors’ waistcloth,‘girdle of loins’ Is 5:27; in wall-images of Chaldeans, [[בְּמָתְנַיִם]] ´[[חֲגוֹרֵי א]] Ez Eze 23:15 (cf. 2Ki 1:18 v. sub [[אָזַר]]) so fig. of Yahweh's power over kings [[וַיֶּאְסׂר אֵזוֹר בְּמָתְנֵיהֶם]] Job 12:18 (´[[א]] = fetter, cf. Di; but acc. to RS:1.c. ref. to slaves’ garment); metaph. of righteousness & faith-fulness Is 11:5, Is 11:5 ([[מָתְנׇיו]] ´[[א]], [[חֲלָּחָיו]]´[[א]]).
